text: Wild Horses is a 1985 American made-for-television Western drama film directed by Dick Lowry and starring Kenny Rogers and Pam Dawber. It originally premiered on CBS on November 12, 1985. ==Cast== *Kenny Rogers as Matt Cooper *Pam Dawber as Daryl Reese *Ben Johnson as Bill Ward *David Andrews as Dean Ellis *Richard Masur as Bob Bowne *Karen Carlson as Ann Cooper *Richard Farnsworth as Chuck Reese ==References== *Wild Horses at Turner Classic Movies *Kenny Rogers: Wild Horses shoot at Rolling Stone ==External links== * * Category:1985 television films Category:1985 films Category:1980s Western (genre) drama films Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) drama films Category:English-language films Category:CBS network films Category:Films directed by Dick Lowry Category:Films scored by Hans Zimmer Category:Films set in Wyoming Category:Films shot in Wyoming
title: Wild Horses (1985 film)
